items.title: Market today: All eyes on Federal Reserve's policy decision
items.description: Share market today: The US Fed's policy decision later today will be a major trigger for markets globally. Apart from that, release of economic data in some Asian markets will also be investors' radar

items.title: Trading Strategy: Nifty Bank, Private Bank show bullish trend; key levels
items.description: The Nifty Private Bank Index is currently experiencing a strong bullish trend, with significant gains recorded over the past fortnight

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Jupiter Wagons, REC, Tata Motors, NTPC, Infosys
items.description: Stocks to watch today: Hindalco Industries is planning to enter the solar module manufacturing sector with a new plant in Mundra, Gujarat.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals mildly higher open for India; Fed decision in focus
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets were headed for a mildly positive open on Wednesday ahead of the US Federal Reserve's policy decision announcement later in the day.
